    • testAddItemToDatabase

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"1,NONE","2,ITEM_ALREADY_IN_DATABASE","0,ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT"}) public void testAddItemToDatabase(int numberOfRepetitions, ExceptionType expectedException)
      Parameterized test for adding items to the database.
      Parameters:
      numberOfRepetitions - Number of repetitions for adding an item.
      expectedException - Expected exception type.

    • testAddItemAmountToDatabase

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"false,false,10,ITEM_NOT_IN_DATABASE","true,true,10,ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT","true,false,10,NONE","true,false,-1,ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT"}) public void testAddItemAmountToDatabase(boolean addItemToDatabase, boolean nullItem, int addedCount, ExceptionType expectedException)
      Parameterized test for adding item amount to the database.
      Parameters:
      addItemToDatabase - Whether to add an item to the database before testing.
      nullItem - Indicates whether the item is null.
      addedCount - The count to add to the item in the database.
      expectedException - Expected exception type.

    • testIsItemInStock

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"true,10,false","true,-10,false","false,10,true","false,0,false","false,-1,false"}) public void testIsItemInStock(boolean searchNullItem, int itemCount, boolean expected)
      Parameterized test for checking if an item is in stock.
      Parameters:
      searchNullItem - Indicates whether to search for a null item.
      itemCount - The count of items in stock.
      expected - The expected result (true if the item is in stock, false otherwise).

    • testGetItemContainerInDatabase

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"true,false,10,ITEM_NOT_IN_DATABASE","true,true,10,ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT","false,false,10,ITEM_NOT_IN_DATABASE","false,true,10,NONE","false,true,-1,ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT"}) public void testGetItemContainerInDatabase(boolean nullItem, boolean addItemToDatabase, int itemCount, ExceptionType expectedException)
      Parameterized test for getting an item container in the database.
      Parameters:
      nullItem - Indicates whether the item is null.
      addItemToDatabase - Whether to add an item to the database before testing.
      itemCount - The count of items in the database.
      expectedException - Expected exception type.

    • testIsItemInDatabase

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"true, true, 10, false","true, false, 10, false","false, false, 10, false","false, true, 10, true","false, true, 0, true","false, true, -1, false"}) public void testIsItemInDatabase(boolean nullItem, boolean addItemToDatabase, int count, boolean expectedResult)
      Parameterized test for checking if an item is in the database.
      Parameters:
      nullItem - Indicates whether the item is null.
      addItemToDatabase - Whether to add an item to the database before testing.
      count - The count of items in the database.
      expectedResult - The expected result (true if the item is in the database, false otherwise).

    • testClearDatabase

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"0, 0","10, 0"}) public void testClearDatabase(int itemsAddedToDatabase, int expectedCount)
      Parameterized test for clearing the database.
      Parameters:
      itemsAddedToDatabase - The number of items added to the database.
      expectedCount - The expected count of items in the database after clearing.
